question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:

A. dog
B. sink
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The dog and sink are both in the mid-to-background of the image, and their relative depth is ambiguous without a depth map or clear foreground/background cues.
